features: Advanced plant-derived dishwasher soap powerfully cleans your dirtiest dish messes.
Leaves dishes streak free and sparkling clean.
Free from chlorine, artificial fragrances and dyes.
Fresh Lemon Scent derived from whole essential oils & botanical extracts.
body.description: Seventh Generation Lemon Dishwasher Detergent Gel makes effortless work of whatever is waiting in your dishwasher, without the use of phosphates or chlorine. This powerful plant-derived formula contains enzymes for greater cleaning power and is a USDA Certified Biobased formula of 96%. You won’t find chlorine, artificial fragrances or dye in our formula. As always, the scents in our formula come from 100% essential oils & botanical extracts. For maximum effectiveness in hard water, use it with Seventh Generation Rinse Aid.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have a Tough Job? We Have An Easy Answer Seventh Generation Ultra Power Plus Dish Detergent is a grease-fighting, food-blasting powerhouse that stands up to your biggest mess. This dual-action formula tackles the dirty work to deliver our most powerful clean – all without the use of synthetic fragrances, dyes, phosphates, and chlorine beach. How Does it Work? Our detergents use powerful plant-based ingredients that team up to leave your dishes streak-free and sparkling clean. Enzymes cut through grease and food by breaking down starch and protein-based residue while surfactants remove dirt and grease by holding the molecules in suspension so they can wash away. What’s left behind is a squeaky-clean dish ready for whatever you've got cooking. You Won't Find Synthetic Fragrances Dyes Phosphates Chlorine Bleach

Dual Action Formula Sometimes you’ve got to pull out the big guns. Our dual-action formula with PlantTech uses hardworking enzymes to power away stuck-on food and stains to leave dishes sparkling clean. Real Fragrances Why use synthetic fragrances when you can use the real deal? We gently scent our products with 100% essential oils and botanical ingredients like lavender, orange peel, and bergamot. No Pre-Rinse Convenience Save yourself the hassle and toss those dirty dishes right in – no pre-rinse required. A dishwasher is meant to make your life easier, and we’ve developed our detergents to do the same. Plant-Based Ingredients Our dish detergents are USDA Certified Biobased Products made with renewable plant-based ingredients. Biobased products reduce the need for petroleum-based ingredients and help decrease dependence on fossil fuels. This means a powerful clean you can trust to be gentle on your home and our planet.

Ultra Power Plus Dish Packs Ultra Power Plus Dish Packs Ultra Power Plus Dish Gel Fragrance Free Dish Packs Free & Clear Dish Gel Free & Clear Rinse Aid Powerful Formula ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 0% Synthetic Fragrances or Chlorine Bleach ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Spot Free Shine ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ USDA Certified Biobased Product 80% 80% 65% 78% 65% 62% Fragrance Free ✓ ✓ ✓ Certified Cruelty Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Loads Per Bottle 70 43 65 73 42 75

Caring Today for Tomorrow We are on a mission to inspire a consumer revolution that nurtures the health of the next seven generations. For over 25 years we’ve been thoughtfully formulating products with plant-based ingredients designed with human health and the environment in mind. From recycled packaging and biodegradable formulas to ingredient disclosure and fragrances made from essential oils and botanical extracts – every decision we make considers you and the future of our planet. Did you know that dishwasher detergent used to contain phosphates? When it comes to washing dishes, what's inside your detergent may not seem like a big deal. But what goes into your dishwasher can go into our water. That’s why in 2001 we lobbied for the removal of phosphates in all dishwasher detergent and succeeded in pushing the entire industry to remove them from their products, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best I've Tried
reviews.reviewText: When the little door on our dishwasher began to malfunction and not pop out the little dishwasher pods properly, rather than paying a huge repair price I switched to liquid -- and the little door thingy likes it better than the pods.I have used other products by Seventh Generation so decided to try the dishwasher liquid. And it is fantastic! Cleans our dishes, pots, pans, glasses, flatware, as good or better than our previous one, Cascade. And it has been cost effective to purchase it on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as Cascade
reviews.reviewText: Used Cascade for years. Other "natural" detergents never worked well and my husband would get frustrated with them, so we had basically given in to using Cascade forever. That is until I found this product. We were completely out of detergent and I was at Whole Foods, didn't want to make an extra trip to Safeway, so I decided to give this a try. My husband and I were shocked to find it cleaned as well, if not better than, Cascade. Why would we go back to products that are potentially damaging to the environment when there is one that is more natural and works just as well? Great price here with Amazon Pantry too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to use squeeze and go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great organic dishwasher detergent
reviews.reviewText: Great scent, and cleans my dishes perfectly. Very satisfied, even if it is a tad more expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Especially good for hard water
reviews.reviewText: We have very hard well water (18 grains). Other detergents like Finish Powerballs, Cascade gel, and Lemishine leave our dishes filmy after one wash. The Seventh Generation Dishwasher Gel Lemon is the only detergent we have found that reliably cleans our dishes as well as is they had been washed and dried by hand. Rinse aid isn’t even needed. I normally drive 30 minutes to a store that carries it and am glad to be able to order it on amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Constantly great and neat
reviews.reviewText: Constantly great and neat. Love the colors of green and white, almost like nature where the grass looks up to the sky. Moreover, this product is very good value and even better at saving our health by not loading so much chemicals. Step by step, little changes as buying this effective and environmentally conscious product helps us to mind our home, Earth ! Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very powerful, but will do the job.
reviews.reviewText: Not the strongest cleanser in the world. My dishwasher has 3 detergent level marks. I tried to get away with using the lowest level with this product, but it failed to clean the dishes well. I was forced to use the max level. I seems to work fine then, but you will go through a bottle pretty quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I run the dishwasher around 3 times a week and this bottle has lasted me for a while! It does a great job cleaning the dishes and doesn't have a harsh smell!
